Description:
Mortal Kombat X - fighting the new generation and the next chapter of the legendary series from the famous studio NetherRealm. The developers managed to create the most entertaining and deep fighting game in the history of Mortal Kombat, where violent fights cinematic quality teamed with new gameplay elements. All characters Mortal Kombat X speak several fighting styles, in which use completely different special moves and combos. Due to the deep integration of network functions, each player will participate in a global battle for supremacy in which any fight can tip the scales in one direction or another. An exciting story campaign introduces the complicated story of the set of characters, including the legendary veterans known to every fan of fighting games as well as beginners, for the first time facing a deadly battle.

Features RePack'a:
- It is based on a licensed version of the game
- Do not cut / no recoded
- There are all DLC (Goro, DLC: Kombat Pack, Skin Pack - Samurai.)
- Unlock all the characters!
- RePack by LeoFavorite
